ygData.subject: Re: This dosen't have to do with smithing, but...
ygData.msgSnippet: Spoiler the giant fire beetle leg comes off the queen klicknik in the thicket.  She spawns so rarely that i have never seen her as both my human mage who
ygData.messageBody:
Spoiler









the giant fire beetle leg comes off the queen klicknik in the thicket. She
spawns so rarely that i have never seen her as both my human mage who
fights near there and a halfling cleric who went all the way to level 11
there.

there is also a queen that spawns in qeynos but i dont know if she has the leg

At 05:47 PM 7/2/99 CDT, you wrote:
>From: Henning Seljenes <hseljenes@...>
>
>This dosen't have to do with smithing but I think this is the best place I
>could ask. I'm currently doing a quest from RiverVale where I need to
>collect some items for a bug collection. I need a fire beetle, spiderling
>eye, giant fire beetle leg, giant wasp wing, and a giant scarab egg sac. I
>can get all of the items I need in the Misty Thickey, RiverVale hunting
>hunting grounds, except for the giant fire beetle leg. The only places I
>know how to get them is from the Queen Klacknak and giant fire beetles in
>West Karana. This means if I wanted to do this quest I would need to run all
>the way there. I have never gone through Highpass Hold (only way I know how
>to get there). I was wondering if there was anywhere closer to Freeport,
>that dosen't require a high level character. I'm only level 10 right now,
>and don't want to risk it. then die somewhere were I cannot retreive my
>corpse. Is there anywhere I can go? Past the Desert of Ro or something? If
>anyone has any of the legs near Freeport I'm am VERY willing to buy a few of
>them. Well I hope you guys can help =)
>
>Henning Seljenes (Irontoe, Xegony)
>
